item.title: Report E-2025040631
item.description:
Report E-2025040631

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-28T03:42:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-16
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clean Harbors picked up solid metal totes from Customer. Upon arrival at the 10-day facility, it was observed that one tote had leaked less than 2 ounces of solvent from the upper dome/lid. Material did not leave the truck and did not leak onto the ground.
